p: Table 5 shows that the obtained stable preparations had pH values, appropriate for the skin [ 48, 49], low viscosity, density, and surface tension, which would facilitate the application of nano-perfumes as aerosol. The method used to obtain the composition with the above-mentioned content, did not have any effect on the properties of the preparations. Nanoemulsion obtained by US method had properties similar to those of formulations obtained with a low-energy method. Z-Ave diameter, PDI, viscosity, surface tension, pH, and density values did not show any significant differences ( p > 0.05).
